Relation views

 Complement relation viewA complement view \(C\) for a relation view \(R\) provides operations such that \(C\) behaves like the complement of \(R\). More...

Functions

template<class Char , class Traits >
std::basic_ostream< Char,
Traits > & 		operator<< (std::basic_ostream< Char, Traits > &os, const CPRelView &R)
 Output relation view R to os R is printed as three different groups: the lower bound (glb), the unknown Which is equivalent to \( lub \setminus glb \) and the out of bound ( \(\mathcal{U}_{k}\setminus lub \) ), where \(\mathcal{U}_{k}\) is the universe containing all tuples of arity \(k\).

Detailed Description

This module defines the interface to implement propagators and brancher on relation variables.

Function Documentation

std::basic_ostream<Char,Traits>& MPG::CPRel::operator<< ( std::basic_ostream< Char, Traits > &  os,
const CPRelView &  R 
)

Output relation view R to os R is printed as three different groups: the lower bound (glb), the unknown Which is equivalent to \( lub \setminus glb \) and the out of bound ( \(\mathcal{U}_{k}\setminus lub \) ), where \(\mathcal{U}_{k}\) is the universe containing all tuples of arity \(k\).
